name: Muddy HeightsÂ® 2
description: Poop you way to victory...again! In Muddy Heights 2, you play as a person who has had a little bit too much to eat and needs to relieve himself by any means possible. Poop off various heights onto people and vehicles to score points. Complete level goals to gain cash to buy more food.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Don't get me wrong, it's a fun game, but a little to expensive for the play time you get out of it. Like, I don't say you should not buy it because of it, if you feel like just being silly for about an hour, then this game is for you. But after that you probably wont play it again, if it gets an update with a few more levels, then I think it would be worth the money, for now... not so much.   Still not a bad game though, just a bit expensive.
this game is crashes alot and it was not good like the first game
This game is hilarious and fun.
Only on steam could you find a game that lets you crap on people from a great height!
